## Source: ossf-package-analysis (bdbd2a9a0d851f1dae6e50f3c00e0b0839441f59b05d4e49f753afe278cd0ca9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'web-bluetooth-spp-application' @ 2.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
